研究探索了组织之间的DNA甲基化时钟精度一份新的研究论文于2025年1月3日在《衰老》（老化 - US）中发表，第17卷，第1期，标题为“用于多种组织类型的DNA甲基化时钟算法的表征”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/research-explores-dna-methylation-clock-accuracy-across-tissues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/research-explores-dna-methylation-clock-accuracy-acracy-across-tissues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=585BC524-A0D7-4CA4-9E4-9E58-52222AEC9D4B4B Wed, 12 Feb 2025 12:02:40 -0500 Research explores DNA methylation clock accuracy across tissues
新的双目标疗法为更好的乳腺癌治疗提供了希望由墨尔本大学教授劳拉·麦凯（Laura Mackay）领导的研究人员是，彼得·多赫蒂（Peter Doherty）感染与免疫学院（Doherty Institute）的实验室负责人和免疫学主题负责人（Doherty Institute）与辉瑞公司（Doherty Institute）与辉瑞公司（Doherty Institute）与辉瑞公司（Doherty Institute）合作，与辉瑞公司（Doherty Institute）一起发现了新的见解，以了解可能对乳腺癌的未来治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/new-dual-target-therapy-fersers-hope-for-for-better-better-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/new-dual-target-therapy-rasters-hope-for-for-better-breast-breast-cancer-wareatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A7999067F-E53A-4379-4379-8F95-EFD47E8B1057 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 11:49:18 -0500 New dual-target therapy offers hope for better breast cancer treatment
新发现可能会克服卵巢癌的免疫治疗失败弗吉尼亚大学癌症中心的研究人员通过发现肠道细菌如何干扰治疗方法来解释了免疫检查点治疗对卵巢癌的失败。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/new-discovery-could-over-come-mmune-mune-therapy-therapy-failure-in-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/new-discovery-could-could-over-come-mmmune-therapy-failure-in-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5a326da-87d2-4670-bc65-4b71fb084b38 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 11:30:25 -0500 New discovery could overcome immune therapy failure in ovarian cancer
新技术阐明了Tregs如何控制免疫系统开发有效的治疗方法，并了解免疫系统的机制如何一直对科学家构成挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/new-technique-sheds-light-on-how-on-how-tregs-contreol-control-the-mmmune-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/new-technique-sheds-light-on-how-on-how-tregs-control-th-the-mmmune-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93589b79b79b7b7-44bea-b5c0-95f25809e6e6c1 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 11:20:42 -0500 New technique sheds light on how Tregs control the immune system
开创性的疟疾疫苗只需一剂提供高级保护Sanaria和西雅图儿童研究所全球传染病研究中心（CGIDR）的科学家揭示了一种突破性的疟疾疫苗，Sanaria®PFSPZ-LARC2疫苗，旨在仅使用一种剂量提供高级保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/groundbreaking-malaria-vaccine-provides-provides-high-level-level-level-level-with-just-just-just-one dose.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/groundbreaking-malaria-vaccine-provides-provides-high-level-level-protection-with-just-just-just-nost-one dose.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0fdfcff-4db6-41bf-a68b-eeb-eeb052d3aeba Wed, 12 Feb 2025 11:12:11 -0500 Groundbreaking malaria vaccine provides high-level protection with just one dose
脑创伤的血管变化可能会触发阿尔茨海默氏症的发育近一个世纪以来，暴露于脑部创伤的个体中痴呆症的风险增加，脑损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/1250212/1-18099S-DEFEEFMENT.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/1250212/Axcular-changes-in-brain-brain-trauma-could-trigger-trigger-alzheimere-alzheimere-28099s-defervement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84222f-d16a-4672-9157-A7C5E3373EAF Wed, 12 Feb 2025 11:08:12 -0500 Vascular changes in brain trauma could trigger Alzheimer’s development
更改菜单布局可以帮助青少年做出更健康的食物选择伯明翰大学和阿斯顿大学的新研究发现，在餐厅菜单的顶部将低热量的餐食选择放在餐厅的顶部，并降低了高热量选择的可用性，使青少年更有可能订购更健康的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/changing-menu-layouts-could-help-teens-make-make-healthier-food-choices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/changing-menu-layouts-could-help-teens-make-make-healthier-food-choices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AC43686D-4AA8-42A7-B7F7-941D27FD9731 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 11:00:13 -0500 Changing menu layouts could help teens make healthier food choices
新研究揭示了儿童的BMI模式的变化奥卢大学（University of Oulu）领导的最近发表的一项纵向研究确定了两种新的童年BMI模式，挑战了传统的体重状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/new-study-reveals-changing-bmi-patterns-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/new-study-reveals-changing-bmi-patterns-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c80488ed-f38b-4ca8-b1de-b1de-bf460305b117 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 10:44:00 -0500 New study reveals changing BMI patterns in children
密歇根大学测试临床试验中的新型机械心泵作为临床试验的一部分，密歇根大学的心脏手术和心力衰竭团队将一种新型的机械心泵植入了患者中，该临床试验将将其与目前用于治疗最终心力衰竭的唯一用户进行比较。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/university-of-michigan-tests-novel-novel-mechanical-mechanical-war.-pump-in-clump-in-clinical-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/university-of-michigan-tests-novel-novel-mechanical-mechanical-pump-pump-in-clinical-clinical-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6baf1f52-4289-4289-4b49-9ae7-7f23EA2FB726 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 09:33:00 -0500 University of Michigan tests novel mechanical heart pump in clinical trial
美国资金暂停威胁乌干达的健康与研究计划由于该国科学研究中心遭受了美国冻结对海外援助的影响，乌干达众多危险的健康计划中，疟疾疫苗接种和艾滋病毒治疗是一项危险的众多健康计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/us-funding-suspension-suspension-threatens-health-health-and-research-programsin-in-uganda.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/us-funding-suspension-suspension-threatens-health-health-and-research-programs-in-uganda.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a3d61af-C777-4357-4357-8DF9-3A5E439C5831 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 09:29:00 -0500 US funding suspension threatens health and research programs in Uganda
